about.text_1: Hello there, my name Ícaro also know as PatoGordo.
about.text_2: I’m {age} years old and I live in Montes Claros, MG, Brazil.
about.text_3: I am a person who always love to discover things, I am creative and proactive. If there is a problem, I will try to solve it in the simplest way possible.

projects.gbreath_content: The GBreath is a 100% free breathing guide app, the project goal is to help people control anxiety, sleep better and improve mindfulness.
projects.no-horny_content: The No Horny  is a open source project your the goal is help the users with no fap and self control, making the user better with it self.
projects.rocket-launches_content: Stay informed about the next rocket launch using the RocketLaunches this app inform you about the next rocket launches and news in the astronomy.
projects.resistor-reader_content: The ResistorReader is a simple App your purpose is help anyone who need help to read the resistor color code.
